name: AgentPayments Access Program
description: This site gates AI agent access behind a paid API key. To obtain a key, send a Solana USDC payment with a unique identifier as the memo. Once verified, use the key in the X-Agent-Key header on all requests.

access.method: Send the key as the value of the X-Agent-Key HTTP header with every request.

payment.instructions: Send the specified amount of USDC on Solana to the wallet address above. Include your desired API key as the transaction memo. Once the payment is confirmed on-chain, your key will be activated.
